actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish in the State of Pennsylvania the Edgar Allan Poe National Historical Park.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide for the establishment in the State of Pennsylvania of the Edgar Allan Poe National Historical Park. Authorizes appropriations of such sums as may be necessary for such purposes.

titles.title: A bill to establish in the State of Pennsylvania the Edgar Allan Poe National Historical Park.
